name: How'sBusiness
0:
”Alexa, start how's business”
”Alexa, open how's business”
”Alexa, launch how's business”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how's business
des: How's Business? Just Ask. How's Business by Voice Metrics allows you to set up a “Business Briefing” with YOUR business data. Simply connect Voice Metrics to ANY Google Sheet, Slack Board, or programmatically with our REST API. The data is always there for you to get from Alexa at any time.
